title: matchmaking
body:
How does matchmaking work? 5-6 games in a row someone afk or just trolling. They even don't bother to talk about it, like "I am trolling, give no F".
I mean, I understand bad games, but not afk on purpose. And they are doing it for a long time. Reports don't work, Riot doesn't care about low elo. Can someone advise, what to do in order to get a better team? Not a skill base, but at least behavior. Also even if someone afk you still lose LP (not even a reduced amount). This is so unfair, I think.

replies.body: Greetings Russian Dwarf! You should just play in ranked 5s with people you know, its what I do for real games. Else just burn em'.
